synopsis:
Special introduction video for the live action variety show event "Japan Great People Award 2007" broadcast on Fuji TV. Featuring the achievements and unexpected faces of great men (and woman) of history, nominated by category like the Academy Awards, and deciding the grand prize from among them.

(Source: AniList)

title.en: Japan Hero Awards: Who Is the Strongest Hero?
title.jp: Nippon Ijin Taishou: Saikyou no Ijin wa Dare?
